entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
